mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(a.id,'')ID, IFNULL( a.price, '' ) price, IFNULL(cost.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(a.start_time,'')`start`, IFNULL(a.end_time,'')`end` FROM t_cost c LEFT JOIN t_addition a ON a.cost = c.cost_id LEFT JOIN t_cost_addition cost ON cost.cost_addition_id = a.cost_addition WHERE c.cost_id =#{id}
